thread.title: VMware's quarterly profit jumps nearly four-fold

title: VMware's quarterly profit jumps nearly four-fold
text:
May 31, 2018 / 8:30 PM / a few seconds ago VMware's quarterly profit jumps nearly four-fold Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Business software maker VMware Inc ( VMW.N ) reported a near four-fold rise in first-quarter profit as it booked a gain of $781 million from Pivotal Softwareâ€™s initial public offering.
Net income jumped to $942 million, or $2.29 per share, in the quarter ended May 4, from $245 million, or 59 cents per share, a year earlier.
Revenue of the company, with which Dell Technologies Inc is considering a reverse merger to be a public company again, rose to $2.01 billion from $1.77 billion. Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel
